title: Survey didn't send?
body: So I filled out a survey that riot emailed me, but when i refreshed it said there was an internet error.  How do I know if riot recorded it?

replies.body: If you're worried the survey didn't send correctly, you're welcome to post those thoughts in our Gameplay or Client Discussion boards as well! It may not seem like it due to the lack of responses, but the devs *do* frequent those boards for ideas and feedback!
They do?  So how come when I try to get their attention they never...reveal themselves

Weeeeeell they're busy little poro devs, so we can't expect them to reply to every single thread. Rest assured that they're always watching though O_O.....

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I am either deeply relieved or deeply troubled. They're watching me.....0_0'
